mapper.update:
UPDATE u_merchant
`id`=#{id},
`categories_str`=#{categoriesStr},
`user_id`=#{userId},
`categories`=#{categories},
`have_whole_sell`=#{haveWholeSell},
`entity_type`=#{entityType},
`other_entity`=#{otherEntity},
`file_list`=#{fileList},
`trustee_file_list`=#{trusteeFileList},
`company_type`=#{companyType},
`asic_company_type`=#{asicCompanyType},
`foreign_company_type`=#{foreignCompanyType},
`is_foreign`=#{isForeign},
`is_foreign_registered`=#{isForeignRegistered},
`is_available`=#{isAvailable},
`main_business`=#{mainBusiness},
`ABN`=#{abn},
`ACN`=#{acn},
`ARBN`=#{arbn},
`owner_first_name`=#{ownerFirstName},
`owner_middle_name`=#{ownerMiddleName},
`owner_last_name`=#{ownerLastName},
`owner_birth`=#{ownerBirth},
`sole_trader_first_name`=#{soleTraderFirstName},
`sole_trader_middle_name`=#{soleTraderMiddleName},
`sole_trader_last_name`=#{soleTraderLastName},
`sole_trader_id_type`=#{soleTraderIdType},
`sole_trader_id_no`=#{soleTraderIdNo},
`sole_trader_id_url`=#{soleTraderIdUrl},
`corporate_name`=#{corporateName},
`practical_name`=#{practicalName},
`registered_name`=#{registeredName},
`trust_full_name`=#{trustFullName},
`trust_country`=#{trustCountry},
`trust_check`=#{trustCheck},
`trustee_type`=#{trusteeType},
`trustee_full_business_name`=#{trusteeFullBusinessName},
`trust_builder_first_name`=#{trustBuilderFirstName},
`trust_builder_middle_name`=#{trustBuilderMiddleName},
`trust_builder_last_name`=#{trustBuilderLastName},
`trustee_first_name`=#{trusteeFirstName},
`trustee_middle_name`=#{trusteeMiddleName},
`trustee_last_name`=#{trusteeLastName},
`trustee_id_type`=#{trusteeIdType},
`trustee_id_no`=#{trusteeIdNo},
`trustee_id_url`=#{trusteeIdUrl},
`trustee_address`=#{trusteeAddress},
`shareholder_first_name`=#{shareholderFirstName},
`shareholder_middle_name`=#{shareholderMiddleName},
`shareholder_last_name`=#{shareholderLastName},
`shareholder_id_type`=#{shareholderIdType},
`shareholder_id_no`=#{shareholderIdNo},
`shareholder_id_url`=#{shareholderIdUrl},
`shareholder_address`=#{shareholderAddress},
`liaison_first_name`=#{liaisonFirstName},
`liaison_middle_name`=#{liaisonMiddleName},
`liaison_last_name`=#{liaisonLastName},
`phone`=#{phone},
`business_phone`=#{businessPhone},
`email`=#{email},
`postcode`=#{postcode},
`BSB`=#{bsb},
`account_no`=#{accountNo},
`account_name`=#{accountName},
`bank_name`=#{bankName},
`county`=#{county},
`address`=#{address},
`street_number`=#{streetNumber},
`street_name`=#{streetName},
`suburb`=#{suburb},
`city`=#{city},
`province`=#{province},
`merchant_state`=#{merchantState},
`websites`=#{websites},
`operation_time`=#{operationTime},
`tax_registered`=#{taxRegistered},
`tax_type`=#{taxType},
`estimated_annual_sales`=#{estimatedAnnualSales},
`avg_sales_value`=#{avgSalesValue},
`sales_value_by_card`=#{salesValueByCard},
`sell_discount`=#{sellDiscount},
`rebate_discount`=#{rebateDiscount},
`pay_sell_discount`=#{paySellDiscount},
`pay_rebate_discount`=#{payRebateDiscount},
`marketing_discount`=#{marketingDiscount},
`extra_discount_period`=#{extraDiscountPeriod},
`extra_discount_period_choice`=#{extraDiscountPeriodChoice},
`app_charge_rate`=#{appChargeRate},
`base_rate`=#{baseRate},
`extra_discount`=#{extraDiscount},
`charge_mode`=#{chargeMode},
`marchant_rate`=#{marchantRate},
`user_rate`=#{userRate},
`payment_state`=#{paymentState},
`installment_state`=#{installmentState},
`payment_contract`=#{paymentContract},
`installment_contract`=#{installmentContract},
`is_top`=#{isTop},
`top_sort`=#{topSort},
`remark`=#{remark},
`logo_url`=#{logoUrl},
`intro`=#{intro},
`created_by`=#{createdBy},
`created_date`=#{createdDate},
`modified_by`=#{modifiedBy},
`modified_date`=#{modifiedDate},
`state`=#{state},
`status`=#{status},
`ip`=#{ip},
`longitude_latitude`=#{longitudeLatitude},
`asic_extract_file_url`=#{asicExtractFileUrl},
`asic_extract_file_name`=#{asicExtractFileName},
`lat`=#{lat},
`lng`=#{lng},
`keyword`=#{keyword},
`registered_address`=#{registeredAddress},
`registered_street_number`=#{registeredStreetNumber},
`registered_street_name`=#{registeredStreetName},
`registered_suburb`=#{registeredSuburb},
`registered_state`=#{registeredState},
`registered_country`=#{registeredCountry},
`registered_postcode`=#{registeredPostcode},
`foreign_registered_address`=#{foreignRegisteredAddress},
`foreign_registered_street_no`=#{foreignRegisteredStreetNo},
`foreign_registered_street_name`=#{foreignRegisteredStreetName},
`foreign_registered_suburb`=#{foreignRegisteredSuburb},
`foreign_registered_state`=#{foreignRegisteredState},
`foreign_registered_country`=#{foreignRegisteredCountry},
`foreign_registered_postcode`=#{foreignRegisteredPostcode},
`partner_establish_country`=#{partnerEstablishCountry},
`business_address`=#{businessAddress},
`business_street_number`=#{businessStreetNumber},
`business_street_name`=#{businessStreetName},
`business_suburb`=#{businessSuburb},
`business_state`=#{businessState},
`business_postcode`=#{businessPostcode},
`business_country`=#{businessCountry},
`representative_name`=#{representativeName},
`single_transaction_limit`=#{singleTransactionLimit},
`docusign_envelopeid`=#{docusignEnvelopeid},
`docusign_has_signed`=#{docusignHasSigned},
`docusign_files`=#{docusignFiles},
`trustee_deed`=#{trusteeDeed},
`trustee_company_type`=#{trusteeCompanyType},
`docusign_signer`=#{docusignSigner},
`trading_is_no_registered`=#{tradingIsNoRegistered},
`contract_type`=#{contractType},
`authorised_title`=#{authorisedTitle},
`contract_start_time`=#{contractStartTime},
`contract_end_time`=#{contractEndTime},
`whole_sale_user_discount`=#{wholeSaleUserDiscount},
`whole_sale_merchant_discount`=#{wholeSaleMerchantDiscount},
`whole_sale_approve_state`=#{wholeSaleApproveState},
`account_apply_state`=#{accountApplyState},
`detail_photo_url`=#{detailPhotoUrl},
`merchant_approve_pass_time`=#{merchantApprovePassTime},
`whole_sale_user_pay_discount`=#{wholeSaleUserPayDiscount},
`base_pay_rate`=#{basePayRate},
`app_charge_pay_rate`=#{appChargePayRate},
`docusign_contract_type`=#{docusignContractType},
AND status = #{status.value} AND status > 0
AND id = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT m.corporate_name AS ContactName, CONCAT('\t', m.id) AS AccountNumber, m.email AS EmailAddress, m.liaison_first_name AS FirstName, m.liaison_last_name AS LastName, m.address AS POAddressLine1, m.city AS POCity, s.en_name AS PORegion, m.postcode AS POPostalCode, (select en_name from u_static_data where code= 'county' and `value` =m.county ) as POCountry, m.address AS SAAddressLine1, m.city AS SACity, s.en_name AS SARegion, m.postcode AS SAPostalCode, (select en_name from u_static_data where code= 'county' and `value` =m.county ) AS SACountry, CONCAT('\t', m.phone) AS PhoneNumber, CONCAT('\t', m.phone) AS MobileNumber, m.account_name AS BankAccountName, CONCAT('\t' ,m.account_no) AS BankAccountNumber, m.websites AS Website, m.corporate_name AS LegalName, m.ACN AS CompanyNumber FROM u_merchant m left join u_static_data s on m.merchant_state = s.`value` and s.`code` = 'merchantState' where m.id in
#{item}
select m.id,m.corporate_name,m.practical_name,m.state from u_user u left join u_merchant m on u.merchant_id = m.id where u.email =#{email} and u.`status`>0 and m.`status`>0
mapper.update:
UPDATE u_merchant
`foreign_company_type`= null,
`is_foreign`= 0,
`is_foreign_registered`= null,
`owner_first_name`= '',
`owner_middle_name`= '',
`owner_last_name`= '',
`owner_birth`= '',
`registered_name`= '',
`trust_full_name`= '',
`trust_country`= null,
`trust_check`= '',
`trustee_type`= null,
`trustee_full_business_name`= '',
`trust_builder_first_name`= '',
`trust_builder_middle_name`= '',
`trust_builder_last_name`= '',
`trustee_first_name`= '',
`trustee_middle_name`= '',
`trustee_last_name`= '',
`trustee_id_type`= null,
`trustee_id_no`= null,
`trustee_id_url`= '',
`trustee_address`= '',
`registered_address`= '',
`registered_street_number`= '',
`registered_street_name`= '',
`registered_suburb`= '',
`registered_state`= '',
`registered_country`= null,
`registered_postcode`= '',
`foreign_registered_address`= '',
`foreign_registered_street_no`= '',
`foreign_registered_street_name`= '',
`foreign_registered_suburb`= '',
`foreign_registered_state`= '',
`foreign_registered_country`= null,
`foreign_registered_postcode`= '',
`partner_establish_country`= null,
`business_address`= '',
`business_street_number`= '',
`business_street_name`= '',
`business_suburb`= '',
`business_state`= '',
`business_postcode`= '',
`business_country`= null,
`representative_name`= ''
AND status = #{status.value} AND status > 0
AND id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT MAX(top_sort) FROM u_merchant WHERE is_top = 1 AND status > 0
mapper.update: UPDATE u_merchant SET top_sort = top_sort - 1 WHERE is_top = 1 AND top_sort > #{topSort} AND status > 0
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT (id)) FROM u_merchant WHERE status > 0 AND is_top = 1

SELECT um.*, um.email as liaisonEmail ,uqi.code as code, uu.email as accountEmail FROM u_merchant um LEFT JOIN u_user uu ON um.user_id = uu.id AND uu.`status` > 0 LEFT JOIN u_qrcode_info uqi ON um.user_id = uqi.user_id AND uqi.`status` > 0 WHERE um.id = #{merchantId} limit 0,1
SELECT um.*, um.email as liaisonEmail FROM u_api_merchant um WHERE um.id = #{merchantId} limit 0,1
SELECT * FROM u_merchant where `status`= 1 and `is_available` = 1 and `docusign_has_signed` = 1 and `is_top`= 1;

select count(id) from u_merchant where `status`= 1 and state not in (-1,0,2)
and `practical_name` like CONCAT('%', #{practicalName}, '%')

select u.practical_name practicalName,u.id from u_merchant u where u.is_available=1 and status=1
AND u.`merchant_class` = #{merchantClass}
SELECT pay_success_notify_url FROM u_merchant u WHERE id = #{merchantId} AND u.is_available = 1 AND STATUS = 1

SELECT m.id merchantId, m.practical_name practicalName, m.categories, m.lat, m.keyword, m.lng, m.logo_url logoUrl, IF( f.id IS NULL, 0, 1 ) collectionStatus, have_whole_sell haveWholeSell, whole_sale_user_pay_discount wholeSaleUserPayDiscount, whole_sale_user_discount wholeSaleUserDiscount, marketing_discount marketingDiscount, marketing_discount marketingDiscount, extra_discount_period extraDiscountPeriod, extra_discount extraDiscount, base_pay_rate basePayRate, base_rate baseRate FROM u_merchant m LEFT JOIN u_favorite_merchant f ON m.id = f.merchant_id AND f.user_id = #{userId} WHERE m.id IN ( ${ids} ) AND m.is_available = 1 AND m.STATUS = 1 ORDER BY field(m.id, ${ids})

SELECT m.id merchantId, m.practical_name practicalName, m.categories, m.lat, m.keyword, m.lng, m.logo_url logoUrl, IF( f.id IS NULL, 0, 1 ) collectionStatus, have_whole_sell haveWholeSell, whole_sale_user_pay_discount wholeSaleUserPayDiscount, whole_sale_user_discount wholeSaleUserDiscount, marketing_discount marketingDiscount, marketing_discount marketingDiscount, extra_discount_period extraDiscountPeriod, extra_discount extraDiscount, base_pay_rate basePayRate, base_rate baseRate FROM u_merchant m LEFT JOIN u_favorite_merchant f ON m.id = f.merchant_id AND f.user_id = #{userId} WHERE m.merchant_state = #{merchantState} AND m.categories = #{categoryType} AND m.is_available = 1 AND m.STATUS = 1 AND m.`state` = 1 AND m.docusign_has_signed = 1 AND m.`categories` IS NOT NULL

SELECT m.id merchantId, m.practical_name tradingName, m.categories, m.logo_url logoUrl, s.en_name categoriesStr
FROM u_merchant m LEFT JOIN u_static_data s ON s.`code`= 'merchantCategories' AND m.categories = s.`value`
WHERE m.id IN (${idListStr})
union all
SELECT am.id merchantId, am.practical_name tradingName, '' categories, am.logo_url logoUrl, '' categoriesStr FROM u_api_merchant am WHERE am.id IN (${idListStr})
SELECT m.id merchantId, m.practical_name practicalName, m.logo_url logoUrl FROM u_merchant m WHERE m.id IN ( ${ids} ) AND m.is_available = 1 AND m.STATUS = 1 ORDER BY field(m.id, ${ids})
